author: Claire Farney
comment: Purchased, but it doesn't show up on my LG Watch Style.

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Sometimes you have to wait a bit longer. Or if you have Android Wear 2.0 you can install it from the on watch Play Store. If you have any problems write on developer's mail. Regards!

author: Nam Wook Kim
comment: Fixed! Thank you!

author: Pissasa P
comment: Bought this twice, first time after a while, got it reduced as it never showed up. Seconds time, was taking a risk, as I knew it couldn't be refunded, nope, still hasn't shown on my watch, but every free one has. Last time I buy one as it's a waste it seems.  Update: made sure I was on 2.0 as suggested...my fault! Works great! Certainly do that to all who have that problem! Thank y'all!

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Sometimes you have to wait a bit longer or try resyncing your apps. Also if you have Android Wear 2.0 it is better to find and install the watch face from the watch play store. If nothing works write to developer's mail for a refund. Good luck!

author: Sergei Garcia
comment: Purchased, but when trying to install on a Zenwatch 2 on AW 2.0 I am requested to purchase and pay for it again. No idea of what is going on... Refunded.

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Try to install it from the on watch play store.

author: Farhad Bodhanwala
comment: I love this watch face. I think there is lots of cool things that could be added to it over time. Looking forward to updates.

author: Viktor Hedlund
comment: Looks great, best of the bash watchfaces in my opinion. It's also quite energy efficient.

author: Christian Delgado
comment: Awesome! It looked great! Please add an optional blinking cursor at the bottom of the date when the watch is awake/woken to make it look cooler

author: Christopher Sewell
comment: Ok that worked... Paid twice though... Still quite like it... Only thing I would change is the option to have battery date and time all display at the same time...

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Thank you! It would be considered for the next update.

author: Akash Gupta
comment: Love the simplicity. Would love to have different colors for time,battery...Sublime like

author: artofthecraft m8
comment: The app work grate I just needs to be customizable on moto 360

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Take a look at the watch face settings when you tap and hold on the screen. :)

author: jonypark
comment: Took a little time to install but its great. Really neat looking face. Well done guys.

author: Mark Dickson
comment: Would be cool to have the time and date commands match the theme, Get-Time for powershell, etc.

author: Costin Marinescu
comment: Amazing, retro-looking watchface.

author: Tim Schuckelt
comment: Nostalgic.

author: Cassie Lindsay
comment: Had some trouble installing the watch face, emailed developer who replied within the day. Great nerdy watch face!

author: Richard Walter
comment: Very good throwback to my favorite operating system.  Would love more options down the road to justify the price. Maybe a blinking cursor representing seconds. A custom color option for those that would want it. Other than that, this does what it says. Very simple and reminds me of my younger days.

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Thank you! It is a good idea the blinking cursor. I'll have it in mind. But there is already color options. :)

author: Joel Solomon
comment: This is now my favorite watch face. I love the nerdiness of it! Also, notifications don't block any of the face itself, so you can always see DOS in all its glory! Can you make a BASH or otherwise UNIX-related theme for this?

author: Patrick Cretan
comment: Still waiting but I'm not holding the developer at fault sounds like it's an Android wear problem.    Really wanted to like this but it never showed up on my watch, I have the Asus ZenWatch 2. I've uninstalled/reinstalled, waited several minutes each time, rebooted my phone but still no dos watchface. It does not show up in the Android wear app either. Weird.

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Sometimes you have to wait a bit longer. I don't know why this happens but the problem is not with the app but with the Android Wear OS. I guess those things are fixed in Android Wear 2.0.

author: Raymond Tu
comment: Love it! I'm especially impressed by the thoughtfulness in the theme designs and energy saving mode for OLED screens.  Is there any chance of having the option to change font? Edit: dev was really quick to add the option to hide seconds!

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Thank you! I'll think about those stuff in the next update. :)

author: Bhavrohit Singh
comment: Not able to find the watch face on Asus zenwatch 2. Tried re syncing apps and factory reset..

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Sometimes you have to wait a bit longer.

author: A. Lage
comment: It would be great if the developers make the watchface more smarter. Just adding another customizable "comand" with weather, stocks, or agenda...

author: Ben Bertrand
comment: the good old times of DOS on the watch. well made! all you need and periodically updated.

author: Parker Reed
comment: (Play Services finally just updated itself on the watch)  Working great!

author: Beau Clarissa
comment: Nice and simple and looks terrific  Can you make a green text version?

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Thank you! There is a green text option in the watch face settings.

author: Samuel Turner
comment: Would be great if you could make it 24hour time.

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: There is such option in the watch face settings. Just hold you finger on the watch face to enter settings.

author: Pagon Alexander
comment: Nice simple watch app for people who even know what "dos" was.

author: Dennis Graves
comment: Pretty slick face

author: Matthew Luna
comment: Just perfect.

author: Timothy Galea
comment: I loved this faces look on my Sony SW3. One of the few watch faces I actually show off.
title: Definite nerd WOW factor

author: Kyle Erickson
comment: Simple and nerdy.  Developer was super fast to respond to feedback.
title: Awesome Watch Face

author: Charles Burgess
comment: I set it and haven't changed it since. One request I would like to make, when switching between date and battery percentage, you could also see phone battery percentage. Example... C:\date, press and it will show    W:\battery to indicate watch battery, and press again to show P:\battery which would indicate phone battery.
title: Awesome face...

author: Aravind Sagar
comment: Was excited to try it out. But it does not show up on my watch. Edit: It's finally working now, somehow the app has synced after many days. It looks good!

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Write to developers mail. I'll send you APK if you want to try. If it doesn't work I'll refund you! Thank you!

author: Zac Parks
comment: Just as the description states. This is the best watch face I have been able to find for my Galaxy Gear Live and more than worth the 99¢ . It's a nice, clean design that definitely reminds me a command prompt. The batter % is actually accurate, which is a first for a watch face in my experience. Keep putting out products of this quality and you'll have a repeat customer out of my.
title: Perfect.

author: Neil Matheson
comment: I'm running Android 7.0, and the watch face doesn't show up on phone as installed.

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Your watch must be with Marshmallow.

title: Doesn't show up on my Nexus 6P phone

author: Kevin Frost
comment: Works great on the Sony Smartwatch 3! Just make sure your watch is up to date, and it should work without a hitch. Love the look of this watch face! :D

author: Jacob Mauriello
comment: I had this working but had to reset my watch and now it's not showing up in the wear app or watch

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Try to resync your apps. You can try uninstall and install the app again also.

title: Like it but not working

author: Luke Addison
comment: I'm a bit of a geek I guess but this is an awesome idea.  Love it!
title: Awesome

author: Scott Bennett
comment: Had an issue for my use case. Dev fixed it. Love it now
title: Great!

author: ᵇᶥᵍ ШΞΒȘГẬŚ
comment: Love it, add the month to the date line please 👍and maybe temp?
title: Love it

author: Владислав Глаголев
comment: Rather expensive

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: There is new version available where the problem with the overlapping cards should be fixed. Thank you for your support!
